title: Himi 480
lyrics:
M.L. mo e tau
1.
Kāinga tu’u ma’a Sīsū ē!
Tuʻu ke matu’u, ‘oua e vaivai;
Pa pē peau kae ‘ikai ngaūe,
Hangē ha makatu’u ‘i tahi.
Tu’u ke matu’u, ‘o ‘oua e ngaūe,
Hangē ha makatu’u ‘i tahi:
Tu’u ke matu’u ma’a Sīsū ē,
Si’i Sīsū na’e kalusefai.
2.
Tu’u pē ‘o fai ‘a e tau lelei,
Tau ‘o e tui pīkitai;
Tuʻu ki he matatau ‘a Heli,
Tau ‘a Kakano mo Māmani.
Tuʻu ke matu’u, etc.
3.
Tu’u, kuo ifi talupite
He Kapiteni ‘o e tau;
ʻĀ mei he mohe, laumālie,
Vave ho’ teu ‘o ‘ai mahafu,
Tuʻu ke matu’u, etc
4.
Tali ‘a e angi fulipē,
‘Oua ‘e fili ho lakanga;
Tau kuo toko lahi ē,
Tau ai pē ‘oka toko taha.
Tuʻu ke matu’u, etc.*
